hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: Your partner for high-quality patio solutions

whoAreWe.title: Who are we?
whoAreWe.paragraph1: We are a leading company specializing in providing stylish and durable patio solutions. With pride, we offer a wide range of high-quality products, including verandas, glass sliding walls and side walls, to transform your outdoor space into an oasis of comfort and beauty.
whoAreWe.paragraph2: Don't hesitate any longer and contact us today to request your quote. Together we will turn your outdoor space into a place where you can fully enjoy, regardless of the weather!

quality.title: Quality and craftsmanship
quality.paragraph1: At Alusolutions we attach great value to quality and craftsmanship. Our products are manufactured with high-quality materials and innovative technologies, resulting in durable and reliable solutions. Our dedicated and experienced team members are always ready to advise and guide you in making the best choices for your specific situation.
quality.paragraph2: We strive for customer satisfaction and embrace every challenge with enthusiasm. From the first contact to installation and after-sales service, we strive to provide excellent service and build a long-term relationship with our customers.

featuresBanner.title: Discover our timeless and elegant patio solutions
featuresBanner.subtitle: Make your outdoor space shine with our stylish verandas and glass sliding walls, which add a timeless and elegant look to your home.

benefit1.title: Custom patio solutions
benefit1.description: At Alusolutions we believe in customization. We design and create patio solutions that perfectly match your specific wishes, so you can enjoy an outdoor space that is completely yours.

benefit2.title: Enhance your outdoor experience
benefit2.description: Our high-quality patio solutions enhance your outdoor experience, allowing you to optimally enjoy outdoor living in all seasons.

benefit3.title: Comfort and protection
benefit3.description: Our patio solutions not only provide comfort, but also protect you from weather and wind, so you can enjoy your outdoor space carefree.

oasis.title: Create Your Outdoor Oasis
oasis.description: At Alusolutions we strive to transform your outdoor space into an oasis of comfort, style and elegance. With custom-made patio solutions and high-quality products, we make your dream project a reality. Request a quote today and discover the possibilities for your unique outdoor environment.

value1.title: Quality
value1.description: Only the best materials and craftsmanship

cta.title: Ready to get started?

hero.title: Polycarbonate veranda
hero.paragraph1: A polycarbonate veranda is the ideal choice for those looking for a durable and affordable patio cover. Thanks to the strong and clear polycarbonate roof panels, you enjoy plenty of light, without compromising on protection against rain and wind.
hero.paragraph2: At AluSolutions we deliver your polycarbonate veranda completely tailored to your wishes. Within 3 weeks, our veranda builders ensure fast delivery and professional installation.

benefits.subtitle: Affordable elegance with our polycarbonate verandas
benefits.paragraph1: The investment in a polycarbonate veranda depends on multiple factors, such as the dimensions of the structure and the choice of additional options such as built-in LED spots, side walls or sliding doors.
benefits.paragraph2: We understand that choosing a veranda is an important decision that must be tailored to both your budget and your lifestyle. That's why we offer personal advice and detailed information about the possibilities and costs.

quality.description: The cost of a polycarbonate veranda depends on the size and extras such as spots, side walls or sliding doors. Nevertheless, such a veranda is an affordable choice that lasts a long time and looks beautiful.

list.item1: Material costs: cheaper than glass, economically advantageous
list.item2: Lower installation costs: simple installation reduces labor costs
list.item3: Durability and maintenance: long-lasting with minimal maintenance
list.item4: Energy efficiency: insulation reduces energy costs

item1.title: What is a polycarbonate veranda?
item1.description: A polycarbonate veranda from Alusolutions is a durable patio or garden canopy that extends your home with a stylish outdoor space.

item2.title: Benefits of polycarbonate
item2.description: Polycarbonate is a robust, light-permeable material that provides protection against UV rays and weather conditions.

item3.title: Why choose Alusolutions?
item3.description: At Alusolutions you choose quality and durability. Our verandas are strong and low-maintenance.

item4.title: Personalize your veranda
item4.description: Each veranda can be personalized with options such as LED lighting, sun protection and side walls.

item5.title: Placement and installation
item5.description: Our experts ensure a fast and professional installation of your veranda.

item6.title: Discover our showroom

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Discover our easy step-by-step guide for your polycarbonate veranda.

q1.question: Is a permit required to install a patio cover?
q1.answer: In most cases, no permit is required if the canopy meets certain conditions. Contact us for advice on permits in your municipality.

q2.question: How long does a patio cover last?
q2.answer: Our verandas last for years with minimal maintenance. With proper care you can expect a lifespan of 20+ years.

q3.question: Are your patio covers resistant to all weather conditions?
q3.answer: Yes, our products are designed for the Dutch climate and resistant to rain, wind, snow and UV radiation.

q4.question: How long does it take to install a patio cover?
q4.answer: Within 3 weeks we ensure delivery and professional installation. The installation itself usually takes 1-2 days.

q5.question: Can I expand my veranda later with extra options?
q5.answer: Yes, our verandas are modularly designed. You can easily add LED lighting, side walls or sliding doors later.

q6.question: Do you offer financing options?
q6.answer: Yes, we work with various financing partners. Ask about the options during your personal consultation.

contact.title: Get in touch
contact.subtitle: Do you have questions or would you like to make an appointment? Feel free to contact us!

section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.content: AluSolutions respects your privacy and ensures that the personal information you provide to us is kept confidential.

section2.title: 2. Data we collect
section2.content: We collect data that you provide to us, such as name, address, email address and telephone number when you contact us or request a quote.

section3.title: 3. Use of data
section3.content: Your data is used to process your request, send quotes and deliver our services.

section4.title: 4. Retention period
section4.content: We do not keep your data longer than necessary for the purpose for which it was collected.

section5.title: 5. Your rights
section5.content: You have the right to access, correct and delete your data. Please contact us for this.

section6.title: 6. Contact
section6.content: For questions about our privacy policy, you can contact us via info@alusolutions.nl

section1.title: Article 1 - Definitions
section1.content: In these terms AluSolutions means: the company located in Reuver, registered with the Chamber of Commerce under number 90086449.

section2.title: Article 2 - Applicability
section2.content: These conditions apply to all offers and agreements of AluSolutions.

section3.title: Article 3 - Quotes
section3.content: All quotes are non-binding and valid for 30 days, unless otherwise stated.

section4.title: Article 4 - Delivery
section4.content: The delivery time is determined in consultation and is indicative.

section5.title: Article 5 - Warranty
section5.content: AluSolutions offers a 10-year warranty on the construction under normal use.

section6.title: Article 6 - Payment
section6.content: Payment is made in accordance with the payment conditions stated on the invoice.

section1.title: What are cookies?
section1.content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit our website.

section2.title: Which cookies do we use?
section2.functionalDesc: Necessary for the functioning of the website.
section2.analyticalDesc: To gain insight into the use of the website.

section3.title: Managing cookies
section3.content: You can block or delete cookies through your browser settings.

section4.title: Contact
section4.content: Questions about our cookie policy? Contact us via info@alusolutions.nl

hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subtitle: Find answers to the most frequently asked questions

q1.question: How long does delivery of a veranda take?
q1.answer: The average delivery time is 3-4 weeks after placing your order. This may vary depending on the type of veranda and any custom options.

q2.question: What does a veranda cost?
q2.answer: The price of a veranda depends on the type, dimensions and chosen options. Request a no-obligation quote for an exact price.

q3.question: How long does installation take?
q3.answer: Installation takes an average of 1-2 days, depending on the size and complexity of the veranda.

q4.question: Is there a warranty on the veranda?
q4.answer: Yes, we offer 10 years warranty on the construction and 5 years on moving parts such as motors.

q5.question: Do I need a permit?
q5.answer: In most cases, a veranda is permit-free provided it meets certain conditions. We will advise you on this during the consultation.

q6.question: Can I install the veranda myself?
q6.answer: We recommend having the installation carried out by our professionals for optimal results and warranty retention.

q7.question: Which colors are available?
q7.answer: Our verandas are available in many standard colors. In addition, any RAL color is possible as a custom option.

q8.question: Can I add lighting and heating?
q8.answer: Yes, we offer various options for built-in LED lighting and patio heating.

q9.question: How do I maintain my veranda?
q9.answer: An aluminum veranda is virtually maintenance-free. Occasional cleaning with water and a soft cloth is sufficient.

q10.question: Do you also come to my area?
q10.answer: We install verandas throughout the Netherlands. Contact us to discuss the possibilities.

info.paragraph1: Do you have questions about our products, or do you need help placing an order? Maybe you just want to share your thoughts? At AluSolutions we love to hear from you! Our dedicated team is ready to respond quickly and efficiently to all your questions.
info.paragraph2: For immediate help, we recommend contacting us via WhatsApp. We are also available via email or our contact form.

info.title: What is a Polycarbonate Veranda?
info.description1: A polycarbonate veranda is the ideal choice for those looking for a durable and affordable patio cover. Thanks to the strong and clear polycarbonate roof panels, you enjoy plenty of light, without compromising on protection against rain and wind.
info.description2: At AluSolutions we deliver your polycarbonate veranda completely tailored to your wishes. Within 3 weeks, our veranda builders ensure fast delivery and professional installation.

specs.title: Specifications
specs.frameColorsValue: Anthracite, white, cream or RAL color

cta.title: Interested in a Polycarbonate Veranda?
cta.description: Request a no-obligation quote or make an appointment for customized advice

info.title: What is a Glass Veranda?
info.description1: A glass veranda offers maximum light and an unobstructed view of your garden. The tempered glass is safe, strong and easy to clean.
info.description2: At AluSolutions we only use high-quality tempered glass that meets all safety standards.

hero.title: Louvered Veranda
hero.subtitle: Adjustable sun protection for optimal comfort

info.title: What is a Louvered Veranda?
info.description1: A louvered veranda offers ultimate flexibility. The rotating louvers regulate sunlight and ventilation as desired, from fully open to fully closed.
info.description2: Perfect for those who want maximum control over light and shadow throughout the day.

specs.title: Specifications
specs.warrantyValue: 10 years on construction, 5 years on motor

info.title: What is a Folding Roof Veranda?
info.description1: A folding roof veranda combines protection with flexibility. The fabric can be electrically opened and closed, so you decide when you sit under the open sky.
info.description2: Ideal for those who want the best of both worlds: shelter when needed, open air when desired.

specs.title: Specifications
specs.warrantyValue: 10 years on frame, 5 years on fabric

cta.title: Interested in a Folding Roof Veranda?

info.title: What is a Glass Sliding Wall?
info.description1: A glass sliding wall transforms your veranda into a wind-free outdoor room. The panels slide easily to the side for maximum ventilation.
info.description2: Perfect as an addition to your existing veranda or canopy.

cta.title: Interested in a Glass Sliding Wall?

hero.title: Cube Veranda
hero.subtitle: Sleek modern design for your garden

info.title: What is a Cube Veranda?
info.description1: The Cube veranda is the pinnacle of modern design. With clean lines and a minimalist appearance, this perfect cube fits into any modern garden.
info.description2: Freestanding or against the house, the Cube always makes an impression.

hero.title: Garden Room
hero.subtitle: Enjoy your garden all year round

info.title: What is a Garden Room?
info.description1: A garden room is a fully enclosed veranda that allows you to enjoy your garden all year round, regardless of the weather.
info.description2: Perfect as extra living space, workspace or hobby room with a view of the garden.

info.title: What is a Carport?
info.description1: An aluminum carport protects your car from rain, snow, hail and UV radiation. Stylish and durable, a valuable addition to your home.
info.description2: Available for one or more cars, completely custom made.
